pageContext.claim: “So Billie [Sutton] wants to take the taxpayers and have them pay for health care benefits for illegal aliens. I don't like that. Somehow that doesn't work.”
pageContext.analysis: Billie Sutton, a Democrat running for governor in South Dakota, has no listed immigration or health care platform on his campaign website. As a state senator, he voted to authorize prenatal care undocumented immigrants — a far cry from overall "health care benefits."
